doctype.description: Literal 'DocType' indicating this schema defines a Frappe DocType.

name.description: Unique machine-readable name of the DocType.

module.description: Application module under which this DocType is categorized.

custom.description: Flag indicating whether this DocType is user-created (1) or core (0).

issingle.description: Flag: 1 if this DocType stores only a single document, 0 if it stores multiple rows.

istable.description: Flag: 1 if this DocType functions as a child table, 0 otherwise.

autoname.description: Pattern or rule for automatic naming (e.g., 'field:fieldname', 'hash', custom script).

sort_field.description: Field name used for default sorting in list views.

sort_order.description: Default sort direction for list views.

naming_rule.description: Built-in naming strategy for naming new documents of this type.

document_type.description: Categorization of the DocType for UI grouping and permissions.

engine.description: SQL storage engine used for the underlying table.

row_format.description: Row storage format for MySQL tables.

_order.description: Internal field for ordering child records when fetched.

fields.description: List of field definitions (DocField) available in this DocType.

permissions.description: Array of permission rules defining read/write/create rights for roles.

links.description: Definitions of linked DocTypes for user navigation (via link fields).

states.description: Workflow states available for this DocType.

actions.description: Custom actions (buttons/scripts) that appear on the form.

field_order.description: Explicit ordering of fieldnames for UI rendering.

description.description: Short text description of the DocType's purpose.

documentation.description: Long-form HTML or Markdown documentation for end users.

default_email_template.description: Name of the default email template used when emailing documents.

default_print_format.description: Default print format name for printing documents.

default_view.description: Default view mode (e.g., List, Form, Report) when opening this DocType.

email_append_to.description: Flag to append incoming emails to existing records if matched.

icon.description: Icon name (from Font Awesome) displayed for this DocType.

color.description: Hex color code used alongside the icon in list views.

image_field.description: Fieldname of an image-type field used as thumbnail.

idx.description: Sequence index controlling DocType load order in fixtures.

is_published_field.description: Fieldname used to mark documents as published/unpublished.

route.description: Custom URL path used to route to this DocType's list or form.

search_fields.description: Comma-separated fieldnames to search on from global search.

show_name_in_global_search.description: Flag: 1 to include the 'name' field in global search results.

subject_field.description: Field displayed as subject when emailing document notifications.

title_field.description: Field used as title/header in list views and links.

timeline_field.description: Field used to order entries in the document timeline.

sender_field.description: Fieldname storing the email address for outbound messages.

sender_name_field.description: Fieldname storing the sender name for outbound emails.

restrict_to_domain.description: Restrict usage of this DocType to a specific domain.

nsm_parent_field.description: Fieldname used in nested set trees to define parent link.

grid_page_length.description: Number of rows per page in grid view mode.

rows_threshold_for_grid_search.description: Minimum row count to enable grid search functionality.

max_attachments.description: Maximum number of file attachments allowed per document.

beta.description: Flag indicating if this DocType is in beta/testing stage.

allow_copy.description: Flag to allow users to copy/duplicate documents.

allow_rename.description: Flag to allow manual renaming of document 'name' field.

allow_import.description: Flag to enable data import via CSV or Data Import tool.

allow_auto_repeat.description: Flag to enable auto-repeat scheduling for documents.

allow_events_in_timeline.description: Flag to show system events in the timeline panel.

allow_guest_to_view.description: Flag to let guest (unauthenticated) users view records.

force_re_route_to_default_view.description: Flag to always redirect to default view on list open.

editable_grid.description: Flag enabling inline editing in grid view.

has_web_view.description: Flag indicating if this DocType has a web (website) view.

hide_toolbar.description: Flag to hide the form toolbar (actions/buttons).

in_create.description: Flag set during document creation for special scripting.

index_web_pages_for_search.description: Flag to index generated web pages for site search.

is_calendar_and_gantt.description: Flag to enable calendar and Gantt views.

is_submittable.description: Flag indicating if documents require submission workflow.

is_tree.description: Flag to treat this DocType as a tree/hierarchy.

is_virtual.description: Flag: 1 if this DocType is virtual (no DB table).

make_attachments_public.description: Flag to make attached files publicly accessible.

protect_attached_files.description: Flag to restrict access to attached files.

queue_in_background.description: Flag to process document events in background jobs.

track_views.description: Flag to track how many times a record is viewed.

translated_doctype.description: Flag indicating if the DocType is configured for translations.

owner.description: User ID of the document owner.

fieldname.description: Unique internal name of the field within the DocType

fieldtype.description: Type of the field (e.g., Data, Link, Select, Check)

label.description: Human-readable label shown in the form

options.description: Additional parametersâ€”such as target DocType for Link fields or list of values for Select

default.description: Default value prefilled when creating a new document

description.description: Help text or tooltip explaining the purpose of the field

reqd.description: Flag indicating whether this field is mandatory

depends_on.description: Server-side condition expression to determine field visibility

mandatory_depends_on.description: Condition expression that makes the field required when true

in_list_view.description: Flag to include this field in list or report views

read_only.description: Flag preventing edits on the field in the form

hidden.description: Flag to hide the field from the form

width.description: Width of the field in list view (e.g., '120px' or '20%')

precision.description: Number of decimal places for numeric fields

pattern.description: Regular expression to validate input on the client side

role.description: Name of the Role to which this permission applies

report.description: Permission to view or generate reports

export.description: Permission to export data as CSV or other formats

email.description: Permission to send documents via email

share.description: Permission to share links to the document

link_field.description: Field in the linked DocType that establishes the relationship

label.description: Custom label to display for this link

color.description: Hex code or CSS color name used for the state badge

title.description: Label text displayed for this state

action.description: Name of the server-side method or action to invoke

action_label.description: Text shown on the button or menu for this action

conditional.description: Client-side condition expression to enable or hide the action
